text: eyata ohu “o nuh! niyata vasayenma ohu obage pavule keneku nova; niyata vasayenma ohu napuru kriyavanma karamin sitiyeya. (napuru kriyavehi yedenna obage pavule keneku nova). ebævin oba nodanna karanavan gæna ma veta (tarka kara), novimasanu. nodænuvat ayagen keneku bavata obat pat novanu yayi ma niyata vasayenma obata honda ovadan dennemi”yayi pavæsuveya
